com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP

Class ParticleBPSolverGraph

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDimpleEnvironmentHolder, IDimpleEventSource, ISolverEventSource, ISolverFactorGraph, ISolverNode, IOptionHolder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SFactorGraph

    public class ParticleBPSolverGraph
extends SFactorGraphBase
    Solver-specific factor graph for Particle BP solver.

    Previously was com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.SFactorGraph

    Since:
    0.07

      • customFactorExists

        public boolean customFactorExists(java.lang.String funcName)
        Description copied from interface: ISolverFactorGraph
        Indicates whether or not the specified factor is available only as a custom factor.
        Specified by:
        customFactorExists in interface ISolverFactorGraph
        Overrides:
        customFactorExists in class SFactorGraphBase
        Returns:
        True only for custom factors that do not have a corresponding FactorFunction of the same name

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Description copied from class: SFactorGraphBase
        Initialize solver graph.

        Default implementation does the following:

        • Initializes iterations and multithreading from options.
        • Invokes initialize on contents of graph in this order
          1. owned solver variables
          2. boundary solver variables (only if this is the root solver graph)
          3. solver factors
          4. solver subgraphs
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface ISolverNode
        Overrides:
        initialize in class SFactorGraphBase
